data.text: Excellent customer service especially with Mr. Ikhlaq, the hotel is really clean and tide and very near from everything the rooms are huge and clean, the staff very welcoming and their services are amazing. Also the prices are also very afordable
data.title: Excellent customer service and cleanliness

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Rawad

What a wonderful review for the team especially Ikhlaq  to receive. 

We share all feedback in our daily line ups and in the heart of our house. 

Thank you for motivating us by taking the time to share your highlights of your stay.

We look forward to welcoming you back again soon to Millennium Montrose. 

With best regards,
Ziad El Hawi
Cluster General Manager
owner_response.author: Millennium Montrose

data.text: Assad was very accommodating to our needs. The rest of the hotel staff were exeptional and the service was outstanding. The superior suite was perfect for me and my son, with 2 bathrooms and a very comfortable bed and sofa bed. Would highly recommend.
data.title: First class service

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Heather 

We very much appreciate your comments regarding your stay at the Millennium Montrose.

It is always a pleasure to receive positive feedback. We will share your comments with our team especially Assad..

I am sure that this feedback will serve as an encouragement to all of our staff as we strive to continuously improve the quality of our services.

Thank you again for sharing your experience, and we hope your next visit will be as pleasant as the previous one.

With best regards,
Ziad El Hawi
Cluster General Manager
owner_response.author: Millennium Montrose

data.text: Everything was perfect I had a nice trip the stuff was really nice specially Ikhlaq , very clean quiet and nice area big room nice view I recommend at 200 per cent . I loved the Iftar food the supermarket around and the mosque for Ramadan . The cleaning is done every day wonderful !!
data.title: BEST STUDIO HOTEL

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest 

Thank you for staying with us recently and for taking the time to share your feedback with us. 

The response from our guests is of extreme importance and value to us.

We will continue to work hard to ensure you have positive memories each time you visit Millennium Montrose.

Ramadan in UAE is the best experience. 

I look forward to welcoming you back with us again very soon!

With best regards,
Ziad El Hawi
Cluster General Manager
owner_response.author: Millennium Montrose

data.text:

data.title: Wonderful stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Alexandra 

Thank you very much for your motivating review on TripAdvisor. 

We are delighted to know you enjoyed your staycation. 

The entire team, especially Ikhlaq & karishma       will be thrilled to know that they have contributed positively to your experience and were recognized by you.

We appreciate you recommending us and hope to have the great pleasure to welcome you soon again!

With best regards,
Ziad El Hawi
Cluster General Manager
owner_response.author: Millennium Montrose

data.text: Â· just perfect .room size was perfect, the bed was exceptional, the bathtub was perfect, i loved the whole setup of the room. the view was so stunning city view special thanks to Ikhlaq he was always in reception to help us when ever we need anything.
data.title: A wonderful hotel, beautifully designed
